flavorText: The Iroan Games award no medals. Athletes vie for a visit from Iroas, god of victory.

foreignData.flavorText: イロアスの競技会ではメダルは授与されない。競技者達は勝利の神イロアスからの御光臨を賜ることを目指し競うのである。

foreignData.text: 英雄的 ― あなたが闘技場の競技者を対象とする呪文を唱えるたび、対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、それではブロックできない。

name: Arena Athlete
originalText: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Arena Athlete, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.

rulings.text: Heroic abilities won’t trigger when a copy of a spell is created on the stack or when a spell’s targets are changed to include a creature with a heroic ability.
Heroic abilities will resolve before the spell that caused them to trigger.
Heroic abilities will trigger only once per spell, even if that spell targets the creature with the heroic ability multiple times.
Resolving Arena Athlete’s ability after a creature has blocked won’t remove the blocking creature from combat or cause the creature it blocked to become unblocked.
